categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Leviathan was an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer that served the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. A minister traveled to the supply moon from the Leviathan, and was followed by Rebel Alliance X-wings. Darth Vader, who was present on the moon, attacked the rebels, letting one escape to the rebel outpost on Jamiri. Vader called the Leviathan to track the pilot in an attack on the rebel outpost.
